Class LoginView

java.lang.Object
boundaries.LoginView
public class LoginView extends Object
Entry-point view class for handling all login interactions and role-based routing.

This boundary class:

  • Displays login menu
  • Authenticates users via AuthController
  • Routes authenticated users to their respective views:
    • StudentView
    • CareerStaffView
    • CompanyRepView
  • Handles Company Representative account creation requests

  • Constructor Details

    • LoginView

      public LoginView(CareerStaffView careerStaffView, CompanyRepView companyRepView, StudentView studentView, RequestRepository requests)
      Constructs a LoginView containing the different user views and request storage.
      Parameters:
      careerStaffView - view for career staff functions
      companyRepView - view for company representative functions
      studentView - view for student functions
      requests - repository storing account creation requests

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run(AppContext Context, Scanner sc)
      Main login interface loop. Displays menu for selecting a role, handles authentication, and routes the user to the appropriate view based on their role.

      Supported roles:

      • Student
      • Career Centre Staff
      • Company Representative
      • Company Representative Account Application

      This method will continue looping until:

      • A Company Rep application is created, or
      • The user logs in and subsequently logs out.
      Parameters:
      sc - scanner used for user input
      context - application context containing global data and the session manager
